perturbation.original_text: Aduro shall pay Consultant any amounts due that are not reasonably disputed by Aduro, by check or direct bank deposit, within thirty days after receiving the invoice.
perturbation.changed_text: Aduro shall pay Consultant any amounts due that are not reasonably disputed by Aduro, by check or direct bank deposit, within sixty days after receiving the invoice.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction in the payment deadline. Section 2 initially states that Aduro will pay within thirty days of receiving the invoice. This modification changes the payment deadline to sixty days after receiving the invoice, thus creating conflicting deadlines for payment.

perturbation.original_text: Either party may terminate this Agreement at any time on prior written notice to the other.
perturbation.changed_text: Either party may terminate this Agreement only at the end of the calendar month following a prior written notice to the other.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction regarding the termination terms. Originally, either party can terminate 'at any time'. The modified clause restricts termination to the end of the calendar month following a prior written notice, thus conflicting with the original 'at any time' provision.

perturbation.original_text: This Agreement may be extended upon mutual written agreement of the parties.
perturbation.changed_text: This Agreement may be extended upon the sole discretion of Aduro, with notification to the Consultant.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction in the extension terms. Initially, the contract says that the agreement may be extended based on the mutual written agreement of both parties. This modified text states that the agreement can be extended solely based on Aduro's discretion, with notification to the Consultant, thus creating conflicting requirements for extending the agreement.
